p: A modal interferometer consisting of a small core fibre sandwiched between two standard single-mode fibres, with tapers periodically fabricated along the small core fibre using a focused CO 2 laser beam, has been demonstrated [ 77]. Measurement of the wavelength shifts of the channelled spectrum features led to a sensitivity of 226.6 nm/RIU in the range from 1.33 to 1.38 RIU.
